content.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To support the development of training materials and technical manuals:

1. Gather requirements and specifications
2. Collaborate with subject matter experts
3. Organize content logically and sequentially
4. Create clear, concise, and user-friendly documentation
5. Incorporate visuals, diagrams, and examples
6. Develop step-by-step instructions and procedures
7. Include troubleshooting guides and FAQs
8. Ensure consistency in terminology and formatting
9. Conduct thorough reviews and revisions
10. Test materials with end-users for effectiveness
11. Update and maintain documentation regularly
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
